formalpara.title: Internal help for this AGI command in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Usage: GET OPTION <filename> <escape_digits> [timeout] Behaves similar to STREAM FILE but used with a timeout option.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -1,2 +1,3 @@ Usage: GET OPTION <filename> <escape_digits> [timeout] Behaves similar to STREAM FILE but used with a timeout option. + Runs Dead : No
